introduction: The project provisionally titled “Forgotten Leaders” is a series of seven films, each featuring an individual from the leaders of the Soviet state in power during the time period from 1920 to 1953. Each episode is a filmed portrait depicting the story of life, political and public activities of its hero. The heroes of “The Forgotten Leaders” areindividuals ambiguous from the perspective of the Russian and world’s history and odious and often sharply negative in the eyes of public consciousness.
